intro: Elatine luxurians, commonly known as the water starwort, is a small aquatic plant belonging to the family Elatinaceae. It is characterized by its delicate, floating leaves and tiny, clustered flowers that bloom in the summer months. The plant thrives in still or slow-moving freshwater environments, such as ponds and ditches. Its rapid growth and ability to colonize moist habitats make it a common sight in wetlands. Elatine luxurians plays a role in stabilizing aquatic ecosystems by providing habitat for small invertebrates.
